document_data.name: Sesame oil
document_data.mainbody: '''Sesame oil''' was a type of vegetable oil, produced from the seeds of the [[sesame]] plant, that was considered very useful in cooking.
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where sesame was known to be produced or sold included:
* [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]] sold sesame oil at a standard price of 10 [[gold piece]]s per {{SI|1|gal}}.
* In the desert region of [[Anauroch]], the [[Bedine]] tribes were known to produce sesame oil by placing sesame seeds in large mortars, hollowed out from an [[acacia]] tree. They would then crush the seeds with a wooden beam, counter-weighted with stones, by having a [[camel]] haul it around in a circle. The Bedine sold this oil in [[clay]] [[jug]]s for 1 [[sp]].
document_data.Notable Users: Bedine tribesmen were known to rub a mixture of the oil and [[indigo]] on their chests and legs during the winter season, believing it would keep them warm.
